original_text: Integration with the Mailgun API will provide valuable data on our sending reputation as perceived by our email service provider.

original_text: This will likely include metrics related to bounce rates, spam complaints, and overall account health.

original_text: Simultaneously, integrating with Gmail Postmaster will offer direct insights into how Gmail, a major recipient domain, views our sending reputation and the deliverability of our emails to their users.
units: integrating with Gmail Postmaster

original_text: Dashboard Widget for Reputation Trends:A dedicated dashboard widget is required to visually represent the historical trends of our email sending reputation.

original_text: This widget should display reputation scores over time, allowing us to easily identify patterns, track improvements resulting from any remediation efforts, and proactively detect potential long-term issues.

original_text: To enable this visualization, the system will need to store and aggregate the reputation data collected from the Mailgun API and Gmail Postmaster on an ongoing basis.
